name: Mist (nixelone, ADOrigin, 1ightningstorm)
description:
A game where you play as a spirit in his attempt to regain his crown

Are you skilled enough to reach the crown with the hero or will you need assistance from interesting creatures along the way to guide you to your deserved crown?

Mist is a 2D platformer made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 110.

Controls: 

Esc key - Main Menu

Cursor keys/WASD - move
